meanings.definition: The act of making something active or functional again.
meanings.sent1: The reactivations of old machines brought them back to life.
meanings.sent2: After the reactivations of the power grid, the city had electricity again.
meanings.sent3: The reactivations of the sleepy robots turned them into dancing machines!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the reactivations of a dormant volcano, sudden and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The reactivations of the forgotten memories flooded her mind with nostalgia.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming active or functional again.
meanings.sent1: The reactivations of the old computer system took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: With the reactivations of the old factory, production resumed at full speed.
meanings.sent3: The reactivations of the sleepy bear made it the star of the zoo!
meanings.sent4: The town's revival was like the reactivations of a dormant civilization.
meanings.sent5: The reactivations of the old clock filled the room with the sound of ticking.
